name: get_product_s_offers
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool amazon_data_scraper_v2.
Tool description: Amazon Data Scraper is the easiest way to get access to products, price, sales and reviews data from amazon in JSON format
API description: Fetches the offers for a given product from the Amazon Data Scraper API.

productid.description: The unique identifier for the product whose offers you want to retrieve.
